project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the application will interact with the user through the terminal.

task.name: Implement feature to add a contact
Implement feature to search for a contact
Implement feature to update a contact
Implement feature to delete a contact
Implement feature to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement feature to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement main menu interface for user interaction
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
